articles.title: JWST spots planetary building blocks in a surprising galaxy - Nature.com
articles.description: Planets might be more common throughout the Universe than previously thought, suggest results from the James Webb Space Telescope.
articles.content: Scientists found the ingredients for planet formation in a star cluster called NGC 346, which lies in the Small Magellanic Cloud. Credit: NASA, ESA, CSA, O. Jones (UK ATC), G. De Marchi (ESTEC), and … [+4068 chars]

articles.title: Cambridge University's needle-free coronavirus vaccine begins clinical trials in home city - University of Cambridge news
articles.description: Recruitment is underway in Cambridge for volunteers to take part in clinical trials of a revolutionary new needle-free vaccine to protect against SARS-CoV-2 –
articles.content: The vaccine known as DIOS-CoVax has been developed by Professor Jonathan Heeney at the University of Cambridge and spin-out company DIOSynVax. It is envisaged as a booster targeting SARS-CoV-2 and re… [+1767 chars]
